author: samwilsn
content:
State Sync #30 
 - <@!564718359304863744> EIP-150 is complete, lots of tests to fix.
 - <@!689161464829050960> made a dropdown for navigating between forks (please try it out in your weird devices.)
 - <@!243183686562873344> added a CLI option to start following the chain at a specific block.
